## CardContainer.onRemoveAll() method

Called when cards matching a predicate are to be removed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected abstract onRemoveAll(predicate?: {
        (card: TCard): boolean;
    }): TCard[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  predicate | { (card: TCard): boolean; } | _(Optional)_ Function that returns true for cards that should be removed. |

**Returns:**

TCard\[\]
